role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Ruby on almost any platform
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs Ruby on almost any platform. Ruby is an interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming language. It was designed and developed in the mid-1990s by Yukihiro "Matz" Matsumoto in Japan. Ruby is dynamically typed and uses garbage collection.
